channel.title: CPlusPlusThings
channel.description: CPlusPlusThings provides a comprehensive C++ tutorial suitable for beginners to advanced learners. It addresses interview problems, in-depth source code analysis, multi-thread concurrency, and more.

item.title: C++ STL Source Code Analysis: tr1 and std array
item.description: An analysis of the C++ STL source code covering tr1 and std array
item.author: 455954986@qq.com (light-city)

item.title: EBO (Empty Base Optimization) in STL Design
item.description: Exploring the Empty Base Optimization (EBO) in the design of the C++ Standard Template Library (STL)
item.author: 455954986@qq.com (light-city)

item.title: Implementation of a Simple iterator_category in C++ STL Source Code Analysis
item.description: An analysis of C++ STL source code to implement a simple iterator_category
item.author: 455954986@qq.com (light-city)

item.title: In-depth Analysis of C++ STL Source Code: Doubly Linked Circular List (list)
item.description: In-depth Analysis of C++ STL Source Code: Doubly Linked Circular List (list)
item.author: 455954986@qq.com (light-city)

item.title: Exploring the C++ STL Source Code: The Story of set and multiset
item.description: Discover the fascinating journey through the C++ STL source code to unravel the secrets behind set and multiset data structures. Gain insightful knowledge of their implementation and optimize your programming skills.
item.author: 455954986@qq.com (light-city)

item.title: In-depth Analysis of C++ STL Source Code: Traits Programming Technique
item.description: In-depth Analysis of C++ STL Source Code: Traits Programming Technique
item.author: 455954986@qq.com (light-city)

item.title: Exploring the STL Source Code: Unordered Containers
item.description: Delve into the implementation details of the STL unordered containers source code. Understand the inner workings and optimizations for efficient usage in C++ programming.
item.author: 455954986@qq.com (light-city)
